languages.text: "О чем вы, Вольный Торговец? Я выполнял ваши приказы, как вы того и желали. И служил Империуму так, как вы того хотели — разве союз с темными эльдарами не входил в ваши планы?" {n}Голос Ахиллеаса звенит и срывается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "О чем вы, Вольный Торговец? Я выполнял ваши приказы, как вы того и желали. И служил Империуму так, как вы того хотели — разве союз с темными эльдарами не входил в ваши планы?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О чем вы, Вольный Торговец? Я выполнял ваши приказы, как вы того и желали. И служил Империуму так, как вы того хотели — разве союз с темными эльдарами не входил в ваши планы?" {n}Голос Ахиллеаса звенит и срывается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? J'ai exécuté les ordres en parfaite conformité avec vos instructions. Et j'ai servi l'Imperium exactement comme vous le souhaitiez. Une alliance avec les Drukharis ne faisait-elle pas partie de vos plans ? » {n}La voix d'Achilleas monte fébrilement dans les aigus puis se brise.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que vous racontez, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? J'ai exécuté les ordres en parfaite conformité avec vos instructions. Et j'ai servi l'Imperium exactement comme vous le souhaitiez. Une alliance avec les Drukharis ne faisait-elle pas partie de vos plans ? » {n}La voix d'Achilleas monte fébrilement dans les aigus puis se brise.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: “您这是在说什么啊，行商浪人？我这一切都是按照您的命令行事，都是按照您的意愿为帝国服务！与黑暗灵族结盟不正是您的计划吗？”{n}阿吉里亚斯猛地抬高了音调，仿佛发狂一般，随后戛然而止。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “您这是在说什么啊，行商浪人？我这一切都是按照您的命令行事，都是按照您的意愿为帝国服务！与黑暗灵族结盟不正是您的计划吗？”{n}阿吉里亚斯猛地抬高了音调，仿佛发狂一般，随后戛然而止。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: 「何を言っているのですか、自由開拓者。私はあなたの指示に完全に従い、あなたの望むまま帝国のために尽くしてきたのですよ。デュカーリとの同盟も、あなたの計画の一部だったのではないですか？」{n}アキレアスの声が熱を帯び、途切れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何を言っているのですか、自由開拓者。私はあなたの指示に完全に従い、あなたの望むまま帝国のために尽くしてきたのですよ。デュカーリとの同盟も、あなたの計画の一部だったのではないですか？」{n}アキレアスの声が熱を帯び、途切れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: "Wovon sprecht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Ich habe Eure Befehle in voller Übereinstimmung mit Euren Anweisungen ausgeführt. Und somit dem Imperium wie verlangt gedient. War denn eine Allianz mit den Drukhari kein Teil Eurer Pläne?" {n}Achilleas' Stimme steigt zu einem schrillen Ton an und bricht ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wovon sprecht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Ich habe Eure Befehle in voller Übereinstimmung mit Euren Anweisungen ausgeführt. Und somit dem Imperium wie verlangt gedient. War denn eine Allianz mit den Drukhari kein Teil Eurer Pläne?" {n}Achilleas' Stimme erhebt sich in fiebrige Tonhöhe und bricht ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: «¿De qué está hablando, Comerciante Independiente? Me limité a cumplir sus órdenes siguiendo sus instrucciones al pie de la letra. He servido al Imperium tal y como usted quiso. ¿Acaso la alianza con los Drukhari no formaba parte de sus planes?». {n}Achilleas habla en un tono cada vez más agudo y frenético hasta que finalmente su voz se interrumpe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿De qué está hablando, Comerciante Independiente? Me limité a cumplir sus órdenes siguiendo sus instrucciones al pie de la letra. He servido al Imperium tal y como usted quiso. ¿Acaso la alianza con los Drukhari no formaba parte de sus planes?». {n}Achilleas habla en un tono cada vez más agudo y frenético hasta que finalmente su voz se quiebra.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: "Neden bahsediyorsunuz Hür Tacir? Talimatlarınız doğrultusunda emirlerinizi birebir uyguladım ve İmparatorluk'a tam olarak istediğiniz şekilde hizmet ettim. Drukharilerle ittifak yapmak, planınızın bir parçası değil miydi?" {n}Achilleas'ın sesi ateşlenerek yükseliyor, ardından kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What are you talking about, Rogue Trader? I was carrying out your orders in full accordance with your instructions. And I served the Imperium just the way you wanted to. Was an alliance with the Drukhari not part of your plans?" {n}Achilleas's voice rises to a feverish pitch and breaks off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Siz neyden bahsediyorsunuz Hür Tacir? Talimatlarınız doğrultusunda emirlerinizi birebir uyguladım ve İmparatorluk'a tam olarak sizin istediğiniz şekilde hizmet ettim. Drukharilerle ittifak yapmak planınızın bir parçası değil miydi?" {n}Achilleas'ın sesi ateşli bir şekilde yükseliyor ve ardından kesiliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas
